## HttpServiceSetup.registerOnPostAuth property

To define custom logic after Auth interceptor did make sure a user has access to the requested resource.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerOnPostAuth: (handler: OnPostAuthHandler) => void;
```

## Remarks

The auth state is available at stage via http.auth.get(..) Can register any number of registerOnPostAuth, which are called in sequence (from the first registered to the last). See [OnPostAuthHandler](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.onpostauthhandler.md)<!-- -->.
